descriptionHtml:
[color=lime][b][center][size=8]Soul Gems for Racials[/size][/b][/color]
[color=cyan][size=4]- Trying to make racial powers make more sense -[/size][/color][/center]

[size=4][color=yellow][b]Overview:[/b][/color][/size]
Now you can use Racial Powers more than once a day. But everytime you use it after the first time, you will need a proper Soul Gem. Also, you just need to rest for a while to recover your racial power - no need to wait 24 hours for that!

--
Ex:
The first time you use it, it\'s free.
The second time, you will need a filled Petty or stronger Soul Gem.
The third time, you will need a filled Lesser or stronger Soul Gem.
The fourth time, you will need a filled Common or stronger Soul Gem.
The fifth time, you will need a filled Greater or stronger Soul Gem.
The sixth time, you will need a filled Grand or Black Soul Gem.
The seventh time, you will need TWO filled Grand or Black Soul Gem.
And on.
--

For every time you use your racial before sleeping, you will need 1 hour of proper sleep to recover from it. Every hour slept counts to recover, even if you don\'t sleep all the hours you needed to recover completely. Considering that, you can use racial powers a lot in a single day for free, as long as you sleep 1 hour between uses. But you can\'t use it two times for free in 24 hours without sleeping.

--
Ex:
If you used 5 times your racial in a day, you will need 5 hours of proper sleep to use it again without Soul Gems. But if you sleep only 3 hours, you will be able to use it with a filled Petty or stronger Soul Gem (recovered 3 from 5 hours you needed!).
--

[color=yellow][b]KNOWN ISSUES:[/b][/color]
Soul Gems must be fully filled to be useable. So it is not possible to use a Grand Soul Gem (Petty). This seems to be an engine limitation, since I am unable to detect the soul level in the soul gem via scripts.
Other than that, no issues!

[color=yellow][b]INSTALLATION:[/b][/color]
Use NMM or extract the files in your Data Folder.

[color=yellow][b]UNINSTALLATION:[/b][/color]
Use NMM or delete the mod from load order and Data Folder.

[color=yellow][b]COMPATIBILITY:[/b][/color]
Dragonborn, Heartfire and Dawnguard 100% compatible. Also, completely compatible with other races mods (I just messed with the powers, not the races).

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33459]Lorecraft - Vanilla Blacksmithing Tutorial Fix[/url]: When the blacksmith asks you to craft a dagger (and later a hide helmet), you will get a book on how to do it. That simple.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27780]Diseased[/url]: a complete, rewarding, lore friendly disease system. Featured on G.E.M.S.
